original_title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Hot Rodding Teenagers
overview: Hey, Turtle Fans... are you ready for one radical far-out tale? The ultra-nasty master Shredder™ has joined forces with a mad, bad brain--called Krang.™ The two plan to import their own evil armies to cripple the world. But wait! Speeding on the scene arrive HOT RODDING TEENAGERS FROM DIMENSION X warning our fabulous foursome of green teens about the wicked duo's mean schemes. The Turtles unite with these visiting party animals to battle the villains. PLUS--more shell-shocking excitement with A THING ABOUT RATS!
title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Hot Rodding Teenagers
